summary: Focused and dedicated professional with a record of success in sales execution, expanding my portfolio, and strategic account management. Expertise in consultative selling, client management, and institutional clients, with a consistent ability to exceed quotas and execute expansion strategies through efficient sales practices, cold calling, and new relationships. Able to drive revenue growth and develop sustainable pipelines through communication, flexible salesmanship, and a focus on quality. Skilled negotiator who can build relationships with C-suite executives as well as physicians and providers. Trilingual, with German (C1)  and Spanish (B2) fluency.

currentPositions.description:
•	Implement a General Inpatient (GIP) contract with Huntington Hospital (a Cedars-Sinai affiliate hospital).
•	Collaborate with Hospital Staff Development to train clinical staff hospital-wide on GIP level of care and AccentCare services.
•	Network through Huntington Hospital to schedule GIP and hospice training for all departments, increasing AccentCare brand recognition.
•	Expand the Pasadena area territory by securing and implementing nursing home contracts, while fostering relationships with ALFs and physicians. 
•	Led a successful sales team of eleven through coaching and training, resulting in a 25% increase in patient conversion, 25% boost in referral volume, and a 24% rise in admits resulting in an overall regional census increase of 15%.
•	Collaborated with Southern California site Executive Directors to achieve monthly and quarterly Average Daily Census (ADC) goals.
•	Increased sales performance in tenured sales representatives up to 140%.
•	Exceeded sales goals over a 12-month period, by an average of 185% from August 2021 to July 2022.
•	Expanded West L.A. territory every quarter, starting in Q2 2021 and highlighted by a 229% increase, from Q3 2021 to Q2 2022.
•	Mentored new hires and underperforming HCCs resulting in improved baseline knowledge and sales skills.
currentPositions.title: Special Projects - Regional Director of Business Development  - Hospice Care Consultant

fieldsOfStudy: Dual Languages (German and Spanish) Minor in Marketing

headline: Special Projects - Regional Director of Business Development - Hospice Care Consultant @ AccentCare | New Business Development

message.text: I recently had the incredible opportunity to reunite with my classmates from my time as a Rotary Exchange student in Celle, Germany 25 years ago. It was an amazing experience that truly changed my life and continues to enrich it today. Grateful for the invite and looking forward to the next reunion!
